00100 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00101 #include "config.h"
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 #include "Getopt.h"
00105 
00106 #include <string.h>
00107 
00108 /* LINTLIBRARY */
00109 
00110 #ifndef NULL
00111 #define NULL    0
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 #define EOF    (-1)
00115 #define ERR(s, c)    if(Opterr){\
00116     extern int write(int, void *, unsigned);\
00117     char errbuf[2];\
00118     errbuf[0] = (char)c; errbuf[1] = '\n';\
00119     (void) write(2, argv[0], (unsigned)strlen(argv[0]));\
00120     (void) write(2, s, (unsigned)strlen(s));\
00121     (void) write(2, errbuf, 2);}
00122 
00123 int             Opterr = 1;
00124 int             Optind = 1;
00125 int             Optopt;
00126 char           *Optarg;
00127 
00128 int Getopt(int argc, char *argv[], char *opts)
00129 {
00130       static int      sp = 1;
00131       register int    c;
00132       register char  *cp;
00133 
00134       if (sp == 1)
00135       {
00136             if (Optind >= argc || argv[Optind][0] != '-' ||
00137                   argv[Optind][1] == '\0')
00138                         return (EOF);
00139             else if (strcmp(argv[Optind], "--") == 0)
00140             {
00141                   Optind++;
00142                   return (EOF);
00143             }
00144       }
00145       Optopt = c = argv[Optind][sp];
00146       if (c == ':' || (cp = index(opts, c)) == NULL)
00147       {
00148             ERR(": illegal option -- ", c);
00149             if (argv[Optind][++sp] == '\0')
00150             {
00151                   Optind++;
00152                   sp = 1;
00153             }
00154             return ('?');
00155       }
00156       if (*++cp == ':')
00157       {
00158             if (argv[Optind][sp + 1] != '\0')
00159                   Optarg = &argv[Optind++][sp + 1];
00160             else if (++Optind >= argc)
00161             {
00162                   ERR(": option requires an argument -- ", c);
00163                   sp = 1;
00164                   return ('?');
00165             }
00166             else  Optarg = argv[Optind++];
00167             sp = 1;
00168       }
00169       else
00170       {
00171             if (argv[Optind][++sp] == '\0')
00172             {
00173                   sp = 1;
00174                   Optind++;
00175             }
00176             Optarg = NULL;
00177       }
00178       return (c);
00179 }
